When you begin to feel discomfort, you’ve held a position too long. Avoid fatigue and discomfort by varying your posture regularly throughout the work day. You can do this by adjusting your chair and by standing or walking occasionally. Your chair controls should be simple to use so that it’s easy for you to adjust your chair — while seated — regularly during the work day.
